subject: Sign off on {{sender.contact_name}}'s job on Kanda

rows.text: {{sender.contact_name}} have let us know they have completed the work. Please let us know if everything is in order by signing the satisfaction note.

rows.subtext: If you're satisfied with the work, you'll need to sign a satisfaction note for us. Follow the link below to do this.
We're here for you all the way. If you have any questions about the loan, or the job itself, please reach out to us by emailing help@kanda.co.uk.
